title: ASSOCIATION FOR DEMOCRATIC REFORMS vs UNION OF INDIA CABINET SECRETARY
doc: ITEM NO.801 Court 1 (Video Conferencing) SECTION PIL-W S U P R E M E C O U R T O F I N D I A RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS Writ Petition(s)(Civil) No(s). 333/2015 ASSOCIATION FOR DEMOCRATIC REFORMS & ANR. Petitioner(s) VERSUS UNION OF INDIA CABINET SECRETARY & ORS. Respondent(s) WITH W.P.(C) No. 880/2017 (PIL-W) (FOR STAY APPLICATION ON IA 183625/2019 FOR APPROPRIATE ORDERS/DIRECTIONS ON IA 36653/2021 IA No. 36653/2021 - APPROPRIATE ORDERS/DIRECTIONS IA No. 183625/2019 - STAY APPLICATION) W.P.(C) No. 59/2018 (X) (MENTIONED I.A. No. 45810/2019 in WPÂ© 59/18) Date : 24-03-2021 This petition was mentioned today. CORAM : HON'BLE THE CHIEF JUSTICE HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE A.S. BOPANNA HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE V. RAMASUBRAMANIAN For Petitioner(s) Mr. Prashant Bhushan, AOR Mr. Shadan Farasat, AOR (Mentioned by) For Respondent(s) Mrs. Anil Katiyar, AOR Mr. Mukesh Kumar Maroria, AOR Mr. Arvind Kumar Gupta, AOR Mr. Amit Sharma, AOR Mr. P. V. Dinesh, AOR Mr. B. K. Pal, AOR Mr. Amit Anand Tiwari, AOR Mr. Aviral Kashyap, AOR Applicant-in-person, AOR UPON BEING MENTIONED the Court made the following O R D E R List I.A. No. 45810 of 2019 in WP(C)No. 59/2018 along with W.P.(C)No.333/2015 in due course. (MADHU BALA) (INDU KUMARI POKHRIYAL) AR-CUM-PS ASSISTANT REGISTRAR
author: HON'BLE THE CHIEF JUSTICE
